price: Ia berjalan di muka kaumnya di hari kiamat lalu memasukkan mereka ke dalam neraka.   Neraka itu seburuk-buruk tempat yang didatangi.
arabic: يَقۡدُمُ قَوۡمَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡوِرۡدُ ٱلۡمَوۡرُودُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yaqdumu qawmahu yawma al-qiyāmati fa-awradahumu al-nāra wabi'sa al-wir'du al-mawrūdu
